org.carrot2.core

Class ProcessingComponentConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.carrot2.core.ProcessingComponentConfiguration

  • public class ProcessingComponentConfiguration
extends Object
    Represents a specific configuration of a IProcessingComponent.
